DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria UFI group : Newborns infants 1 3 month age , present upper urinary tract dilatation detect prenatal ultrasound scanning , confirm postnatal sonographic investigation D4 D10 life show renal pelvis anteroposterior diameter > 10 mm and/or ureter > 6 mm , Written , inform consent obtain 2 parent Inclusion Criteria control group : Newborns infants 1 3 month age , Written , inform consent obtain 2 parent Noninclusion Criteria UFI group : urological associate anomaly : bladder dysfunction , solitary kidney , bilateral pathology , Absence parent consent Noninclusion Criteria control group : Nephrologic urological anomaly Previous medical condition prior surgery ; except minor surgery ( inguinal hernia , umbilical hernia , hypertrophic pyloric stenosisâ€¦.. ) Absence parent consent
